metadata.title: CVE-2015-3226 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in json/encoding.rb in ActiveSupport in Ruby on Rails 3.x and 4.1.x before 4.1.11 and 4.2.x before 4.2.2allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via acrafted Hash that is mishandled during JSON encoding.

criterions.comment: ruby-activesupport-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
